document_data.caption: Cover of the last edition of Dungeon Magazine.
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 221''' was released in December of 2013 in online format only. This is the final edition of ''Dungeon''. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Index.Creatures: : {{P|[[battle wight]]|29-30, 35, 42}} • {{P|[[Chosen of Faluzure]]|29, 32, 36, 40}} • {{P|[[Chosen of Torm]]|29}} • {{P|[[dragon]]|29-30, 32, 36, 38-40}} ({{P|[[black dragon|black]]|29, 36, 39-40}}) • {{P|[[ghost]]|36}} • {{P|[[half-orc]]|29, 31, 43}} • {{P|[[human]]|29, 43}} ({{P|[[Elturgard paladin]]|43}}) • {{P|[[ogre]]|34, 41}} ({{P|[[ogre juggernaut|juggernaut]]|34, 41}}) • {{P|[[orc]]|28-36, 38-39, 41-43}} ({{P|[[orc rampager|rampager]]|31, 35, 41}}, {{P|[[orc reaver|reaver]]|31, 35, 38, 41}}, {{P|[[orc storm shaman|storm shaman]]|31, 34, 42}}) • {{P|[[vampiric mist]]|32-35, 42}}
